page.title: 15EVENTS IN FLECKNEY
page.content: FLECKNEY FUN RUN Every year during July or August my mum helps to organise a fun run. It is a hot and tiring race but people like me just run for the fun and don't take it seriously.It is 50p for children, 50p for O.A.P.'s and Â£1.00 for adults to enter. One year someone even entered a dog for Â£1.00. FLECKNEY PRAM RACE Every year the men of the village dress up as babies and mothers for the Fleckney Pram Race. The idea if the game is that they push a pram round the village and drink glasses of beer.
